Package com.pi4j.io.gpio

Interface GpioController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GpioControllerImpl
    public interface GpioController
    Gpio controller interface. This interface describes all operations over GPIO.
    Author:
    Robert Savage (http://www.savagehomeautomation.com)

      • unexport

        void unexport​(Pin... pin)
        Unexport a GPIO pin by Pin instance. This method will explicitly unexport any Pin whether it has been provisioned in Pi4J or not.
        Parameters:
        pin - GPIO pin instance (i.e. RaspiPin.GPIO_00)

      • unexport

        void unexport​(GpioPin... pin)
        Unexport a GPIO pin by GpioPin instance. This method will unexport an existing provisoned pin
        Parameters:
        pin - provisioned GPIO pin instance

      • unexportAll

        void unexportAll()
        Unexport all GPIO pins that have been provisioned by Pi4J in the context of this program.
